name: PTG [Palmetto Technology Group]
description:
At Palmetto Technology Group (PTG), our goal is to take the guesswork and frustration out of information technology (IT) and to be a key component of to helping you meet your goals as an organization.
Our team serves as outsourced IT or supplemental support for small to mid-sized businesses throughout the southeast. We build solutions to enable our customers to never lose their data and to safely and securely access your data wherever you are.
We're a Microsoft Partner and a member of the Microsoft Cloud Champions Club - an exclusive group of Microsoft Partners committed to helping customers leverage the Microsoft Cloud in their businesses. We were recently named 2015 Microsoft US SMB Champions Club Greater Southeast Cloud Partner of the Year.
